pub.citation: Torices, R. 2010. Adding time-calibrated branch lengths to the Asteraceae supertree. Journal of Systematics and Evolution. doi: 10.1111/j.1759-6831.2010.00088.x

pmmd.notes: Webb removed Calyceraceae to preserve APGIII backbone. Removed internal clade names. Added 2, 3, 4 to some duplicate taxa.
